meanings.definition: A compound found in red wine and certain plants that is believed to have antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent1: The resveratrol in red wine is said to be good for your health.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe that resveratrol in plants can help fight off illnesses.
meanings.sent3: I heard a joke that a grape asked the resveratrol to protect it from getting squished.
meanings.sent4: The resveratrol acted like a shield, protecting the plant from harm.
meanings.sent5: Imagine resveratrol as a tiny superhero fighting against harmful molecules in your body.

meanings.definition: A substance that is thought to have potential health benefits due to its antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent1: Doctors recommend consuming resveratrol for its potential health benefits.
meanings.sent2: The resveratrol supplement is popular among health-conscious individuals.
meanings.sent3: I saw a funny video where a bottle of resveratrol danced to promote good health.
meanings.sent4: Her glowing skin was compared to the effects of resveratrol, making her look radiant.
meanings.sent5: The idea of resveratrol protecting your cells is like having a personal bodyguard for your health.
